Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  cardConstraintOnValueChild

Element:        CardConstraintOnValueChild
Description:  "It is an entry with a card constraint on the value's child"
Value :     Thing1
            Thing1.Thing2 1..2

Element:      Thing1   // change to Group
Property:     Thing2 0..*

Element:      Thing2
Value:        string
